channel.title: Nether - Block Glitch?
channel.description:
Not sure if this is a known glitch or is triggered by something, but the other night I had a weird glitch in the Nether. I was building a block line to get to some lava and noticed everytime I placed a block, I would receive the block back in my inventory but the block would still be put on the map. So basically a dupe kind of thing.
It was fixed when I died, but I did keep the blocks that were received back when I returned to the normal map. I didn't have time to catch a video before I died. I don't think it worked outside of the Nether, and the blocks being set were dirt and cobblestone.
Any information on this?

@Spankr_Poodle wrote:

It’s happened to me once and badger outside of the nether and in it.
